info.title: BlingAuto Car Wash Management API
info.description:
## Car Wash Management System API

        A comprehensive API for managing car wash business operations including:
        
        * **Authentication & Authorization** - User management with role-based access
        * **Booking Management** - Create, manage, and track car wash bookings
        * **Pricing & Quotes** - Calculate service prices and generate quotes
        * **Scheduling** - Resource allocation and availability management
        * **Vehicle Management** - Customer vehicle registration and management
        * **Service Management** - Service and category configuration
        
        ### Architecture
        
        Built with Clean Architecture principles:
        - Domain-driven design
        - Dependency inversion
        - Feature-based modular structure
        
        ### Authentication
        
        Uses JWT-based authentication with role-based access control:
        - **Admin**: Full system access
        - **Manager**: Business operations management
        - **Washer**: Service delivery operations
        - **Client**: Customer self-service portal

get.description:
Health check endpoint.
Returns overall system health status.

schema.title: Response Health Check Health Health Get

get.description:
Readiness check endpoint.
Returns whether the application is ready to serve traffic.

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Health Ready Get

post.description:
Register a new user account.

Creates a new user account with email verification required.
The user will receive an email with a verification link.

Authenticate user and return access and refresh tokens.

Returns JWT access token for API authentication and refresh token
for obtaining new access tokens.

Refresh access token using refresh token.

Returns new access token and optionally rotates the refresh token.

Verify user email address using verification token.

Activates the user account after successful email verification.

Request password reset for user account.

Sends password reset email if the email address exists.

Reset password using reset token.

Changes the user's password using a valid reset token.

get.description:
Get current user profile information.

Returns the authenticated user's profile data.

List all users with pagination and filters.

Admin only endpoint to list all users in the system.

Get user by ID.

Admin only endpoint to get any user's information.

patch.description:
Update user role.

Admin only endpoint to change a user's role.

post.description:
Change current user's password.

Requires current password for verification. All user sessions will be
invalidated after password change for security.

put.description:
Update current user's profile information.

Allows updating first name, last name, and phone number.
Email cannot be changed through this endpoint.

post.description:
Logout current user from all devices.

Revokes all refresh tokens and invalidates all active sessions.
The current access token will be blacklisted until its natural expiry.
Create a new booking with specified services and schedule.

get.description: List bookings with optional filtering and pagination.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific booking.

post.description: Cancel an existing booking with optional reason.

get.description: Get booking statistics for administrators.

post.description: Confirm a pending booking. Only staff members can confirm bookings.
Start a confirmed booking. Marks the booking as in progress.
Mark an in-progress booking as completed. Calculates overtime fees if applicable.
Reschedule a booking to a new time. Requires minimum 2 hours notice.
Add additional services to a pending booking. Maximum 10 services total.

delete.description: Remove a service from a pending booking. Minimum 1 service must remain.

post.description: Mark a confirmed booking as no-show after grace period. Charges 100% fee.
Rate a completed booking (1-5 stars). Can only be done once per booking.
Create a new service category. Admin only.

get.description: List all service categories.

post.description: Create a new service in a category. Manager or Admin only.

get.description: List services with optional filters and pagination.
Get popular services.
Search services by name or description.
Get a specific service by ID.

patch.description: Update service price. Manager or Admin only.
Set or unset service as popular. Manager or Admin only.

get.description: List all vehicles for the current user.

post.description: Create a new vehicle for the current user.

get.description: Get a specific vehicle by ID.

put.description: Set a vehicle as the default for the user.

post.description:
Calculate a price quote for selected services.

This endpoint implements the pricing calculation rules defined in:
- RG-BOK-001: Service selection constraints
- RG-BOK-002: Duration constraints
- RG-BOK-003: Price constraints

get.description:
Validate that a quote is still valid and get updated pricing if needed.

Checks:
- All services are still active
- Pricing hasn't changed
- Quote hasn't expired

List all available services for pricing.

Returns services that can be included in quotes.

schema.title: Response List Available Services Api V1 Pricing Services Get

post.description: Create a new wash bay. Requires Admin or Manager role.

get.description: List all wash bays with optional filtering. Requires Admin, Manager, or Washer role.

patch.description: Update wash bay configuration. Requires Admin or Manager role.

delete.description: Soft delete a wash bay. Requires Admin role.

post.description: Create a new mobile team. Requires Admin or Manager role.

get.description: List all mobile teams with optional filtering. Requires Admin, Manager, or Washer role.

patch.description: Update mobile team configuration. Requires Admin or Manager role.

delete.description: Soft delete a mobile team. Requires Admin role.

post.description: Create a new staff member. Requires Admin or Manager role.

get.description: List all staff members with optional filters. Requires Admin, Manager, or Washer role.
Get staff member details by ID.

patch.description: Update staff member information. Requires Admin or Manager role.

delete.description: Deactivate (soft delete) a staff member. Requires Admin role.

post.description: Upload a document for staff member (ID, certificate, contract, etc.).

get.description: Get all documents for a staff member.

patch.description: Mark document as verified. Requires Admin or Manager role.

post.description: Check in staff member for the day.
Check out staff member for the day.
Manually record attendance (for managers/admins).

get.description: Get attendance history and statistics for a staff member.

post.description: Create a work schedule for staff member. Requires Admin or Manager role.

get.description: Get work schedule for a staff member.

patch.description: Update a work schedule. Requires Admin or Manager role.
